data.prayer: Jesus, 19,900 people live in the state of Chobe. Please, give them 3 new simple churches this year.

data.location_label: Photo from the state of Chobe, Botswana
data.section_summary: What conditions of religion or environment could you pray for here?

data.prayer: Lord, we know that you invest more in those who have been faithful with what they have been given. Please, richly bless each faithful believer in Chobe with more spiritual insight, wisdom, courage and vision.
data.verse: So take the bag of gold from him and give it to the one who has ten bags. For whoever has will be given more, and they will have an abundance. Whoever does not have, even what they have will be taken from them.

data.label_1: One disciple of Jesus for every 12 lost neighbors

data.prayer: Pour your Spirit out on the 19,900 citizens of Chobe, Botswana, so that they might know your name and the name of your Son.
data.verse: And afterward, I will pour out my Spirit on all people. your sons and daughters will prophesy, your old men will dream dreams, your young men will see visions.

data.prayer: Father, we pray that the people of Chobe, Botswana will learn to study the Bible, understand it, obey it, and share it.
Father, let the threatened of Chobe, Botswana know that it is better to trust in you than to trust in humans.
data.verse: It is better to take refuge in the Lord than to trust in humans.

data.prayer: Father, send out evangelists who will challenge people like Peter who said, "Repent and be baptized, every one of you" in the state of Chobe, Botswana.
data.verse: Peter replied, “Repent and be baptized, every one of you, in the name of Jesus Christ for the forgiveness of your sins. And you will receive the gift of the Holy Spirit.

data.prayer: Jesus, raise up prophets and truth speakers in your church in Chobe, Botswana so that the church can grow in every way into the mature body of you its head.
data.verse: Instead, speaking the truth in love, we will grow to become in every respect the mature body of him who is the head, that is, Christ.

data.section_summary:
the state of Chobe, Botswana has a population of 19,900.

We estimate Chobe has 1,643 people who might know Jesus, 11,394 people who might know about Jesus culturally, and 6,863 people who do not know Jesus.

This is 1 believer for every 12 neighbors who need Jesus.
